name: Frag Saga
description:
#LD38 Entry

=====================================================

The game about collect PIECEs of world and place them to make the world bigger. The goal is to reach goal position.

=====================================================

How to play:

WASD move, SPACE jump. TAB to switch to world view, where you can:

DRAG the map to see around DRAG pieces to make a bigger world (You can rotate the piece by RIGHT click while dragging a piece)

GOAL for each level is to reach the TARGET point. (Mark in map mode)
